Participants will develop a professional workflow from concept to final delivery, including client communication strategies and portfolio development. title: CCNA (Cisco Certified Network Associate) Course
technology: Cisco IOS, Routing Protocols, Switching, Network Security, IPv4/IPv6, WAN Technologies
details: This CCNA certification course provides foundational knowledge in networking concepts, IP addressing, Cisco device configuration, and troubleshooting. Students will learn to configure routers and switches, implement network security, and understand WAN technologies. The course prepares participants for the Cisco CCNA certification exam and real-world networking challenges.
courseOverview: This intensive CCNA certification course provides foundational to intermediate networking knowledge aligned with Cisco's certification objectives. Students learn to install, configure, operate, and troubleshoot medium-sized routed and switched networks. The curriculum covers network fundamentals, IP connectivity, network access, IP services, security fundamentals, and automation. Hands-on labs using Cisco equipment and simulation software provide practical experience with routing protocols, VLANs, ACLs, and network troubleshooting. The course emphasizes real-world scenarios including network design considerations, performance baselining, and security best practices. Students will complete multiple comprehensive networking projects and be prepared to take the CCNA certification exam upon completion. This training is ideal for those pursuing network administrator, engineer, or technician roles.
